abort.already_in_progress: Config flow for device is already in progress.
abort.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to the Konnected Panel

error.register_failed: Failed to register, please try again

io.description: Discovered a {model} at {host}. Select the base configuration of each I/O below - depending on the I/O it may allow for binary sensors (open/close contacts), digital sensors (dht and ds18b20), or switchable outputs. You'll be able to configure detailed options in the next steps.
io.title: Configure I/O

io_ext.description: Select the configuration of the remaining I/O below.  You'll be able to configure detailed options in the next steps.
io_ext.title: Configure Extended I/O

options_binary.description: Please select the options for the binary sensor attached to {zone}
options_binary.title: Configure Binary Sensor

options_digital.description: Please select the options for the digital sensor attached to {zone}
options_digital.title: Configure Digital Sensor

options_switch.description: Please select the output options for {zone}
options_switch.title: Configure Switchable Output

user.description: Please enter the host information for your Konnected Panel.
user.title: Discover Konnected Device
